name: camila granny square hat
notes:
this granny square hat has a slouchy fit. my version is made with two colors but it would also look great scrappy! this was originally released in 3 clues as the 20th pattern in the [weekend mystery crochet alongs with underground crafter][1]. this pattern is also part of the [third edition of granny square month][2].

**finished size**
teen/adult small: 19.5" (49.5 cm) hat circumference x 9.5" (24 cm) hat height.

**materials**
lion brand vanna's choice yarn (100% acrylic, 3.5 oz/100 g, 170 yd/156 m) â€“ 1 skein in 405g silver heather (ca) and 1 skein in 178ac sea glass (cb), *or approximately 170 yd (156 m) in ca and 55 yd (50.5 m) in cb in any medium weight yarn*.

us size h-8/5 mm crochet hook, *or any size needed to obtain correct gauge*.

yarn needle.

**gauge**
granny square = 3.25" (8.5 cm) square in pattern. *for best fit, always check your gauge*.

  [2]: https://undergroundcrafter.com/2025/06/01/granny-square-month-is-back/
